Lobstruck/Proto

  Lobstruck walked out of the forest, where was everyone. He found a 
valley. He looked down and saw an human figure. He fired an optic 
blast at the humanfigure. He walked over to it. It was a protohuman. 
"Hmm, there must be more of these around. I will kill all of them." 
Lobstruck went down in to the valley and found a village with about
30 
protohumans. He walked into the village. 

  Some of the Proto-human noticed him and started yelling. Some 
started throwing rocks at him, as others were runnig in terror and 
other were looking at him currioustly. 

  A rock hit Lobstruck, scracting his armor, "Hey, you scratched my 
armor, I have to go to a cr chamber to get it back to normal and I 
hate CR CHAMBERS." Lobstruck fired a optic at a human that was about 
to throw a rock at him, as he walked over to the one that nailed him 
with a rock. 

  The protohuman saw the bot coming as he started to throw more rocks 
at him. Some of the Protohumans who were watching, started to run in 
terror.

  Lobstruck punched the human multiple time, killing him. He then 
pulled out his double barrel pulse shotgun as he fired at the 
retraeting humans. 

  The Reatreating protohumans were mowed down to their death. There 
were only 5 protohumans alive now. Each of the human started to throw 
more rockets at the bot.

  Lobstuck pulled out  his sword as he went and sliced up 4 of the 
humans. He watched as they fell over dead. He went up and grabbed the 
last human and brought the protohumans face to his. He took out a 
small pocket knife and cut off the human chest. Lobstruck then
grabbed 
the beating heart and put it into a stroage bag he was carring. He 
then left the village, laughing as he counted 32 dead protohumans. He 
climb up the valley and started to look for some bots again. He had
to 
find a bot, it didn't matter if it was maximal or predacon, he wanted 
to know if there was life on this planet.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Proto all of a sudden grabbed his head as he had a visoin of the 
village of Protohumans that were killed. He didn't know what was
going 
on. "I'm going to take a nap."


(Can someone find lobstruck.)
